column2: an A.M. Eatery////Excellent! Â The hubs and I got the pancake flight (pineapple
column4: and sweet potato-the pineapple and sweet potato were the best)
column5: and the spud deluxe. Had to wait an hour for brunch on a Saturday
column6: but I didn't mind because I hit up several of the consignment and thrift stores in the area while I waited. Snooze will text you when your table is ready. We will be returning.
